game.name: Techno: 2Kill
game.shortDescription: A hardcore, fast-paced and unpredictable roguelike shooter set in a dystopian future where AI decided to save humanity... by exterminating it. Your body is the ultimate weapon. Liberate Earth and countless other planets from the grip of a deranged AI.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A hardcore, fast-paced and unpredictable roguelike shooter set in a dystopian future where AI decided to save humanity... by exterminating it. Your body is the ultimate weapon. Liberate Earth and countless other planets from the grip of a deranged AI.
